doctor-letter.decision.q7.label: Do you suffer from post-exertional malaise (PEM)?
doctor-letter.decision.q8.label: Select a cause
doctor-letter.case.0.paragraph: The patient does not meet the full ME/CFS criteria or post-exertional malaise (PEM) is missing. It is recommended to consider differential diagnosis and conduct further investigations to clarify the cause of symptoms.
doctor-letter.case.1.paragraph: The patient presents with a full ME/CFS picture that developed after an EBV infection. The symptoms correspond to established diagnostic criteria (CCC/IOM) with characteristic post-exertional malaise.
doctor-letter.case.2.paragraph: The patient presents with a full ME/CFS picture that developed after an Influenza infection. The symptoms correspond to established diagnostic criteria (CCC/IOM) with characteristic post-exertional malaise.
doctor-letter.case.3.paragraph: The patient presents with a full ME/CFS picture that developed after a COVID-19 infection. The symptoms correspond to established diagnostic criteria (CCC/IOM) with characteristic post-exertional malaise.
doctor-letter.case.4.paragraph: The patient presents with a full ME/CFS picture that developed after a COVID-19 vaccination. The symptoms correspond to established diagnostic criteria (CCC/IOM) with characteristic post-exertional malaise.
doctor-letter.case.5.paragraph: The patient shows chronic fatigue and post-exertional malaise after an EBV infection. Further evaluation regarding ME/CFS is recommended to fully assess the diagnostic criteria.
doctor-letter.case.6.paragraph: The patient shows chronic fatigue and post-exertional malaise after an Influenza infection. Further evaluation regarding ME/CFS is recommended to fully assess the diagnostic criteria.
doctor-letter.case.7.paragraph: The patient shows chronic fatigue and post-exertional malaise after a COVID-19 infection. Further evaluation regarding ME/CFS is recommended to fully assess the diagnostic criteria.
doctor-letter.case.8.paragraph: The patient shows chronic fatigue and post-exertional malaise after a COVID-19 vaccination. Further evaluation regarding ME/CFS is recommended to fully assess the diagnostic criteria.
doctor-letter.case.9.paragraph: The patient presents with a full ME/CFS picture that developed after another infection. The symptoms correspond to established diagnostic criteria (CCC/IOM) with characteristic post-exertional malaise.
doctor-letter.case.10.paragraph: The patient presents with a full ME/CFS picture that developed after another identified cause. The symptoms correspond to established diagnostic criteria (CCC/IOM) with characteristic post-exertional malaise.
doctor-letter.case.11.paragraph: The patient presents with a full ME/CFS picture. The cause could not be identified. The symptoms correspond to established diagnostic criteria (CCC/IOM) with characteristic post-exertional malaise.
doctor-letter.case.12.paragraph: The patient shows chronic fatigue and post-exertional malaise without a known cause. Further evaluation regarding ME/CFS is recommended to fully assess the diagnostic criteria.
doctor-letter.case.13.paragraph: The patient shows chronic fatigue and post-exertional malaise due to another identified cause. Further evaluation regarding ME/CFS is recommended to fully assess the diagnostic criteria.
